name: JIRA Darkness
description:
Based off of https://userstyles.org/styles/174070/jira-dark-theme-v2

This accommodates the latest JIRA site updates. This does NOT look good on confluence. As a matter of fact, the only thing really tested is the JIRA agile board.

discussions.name: Works but needs a little bit more refinement.
Definitely some things I would tweak if I weren't so lazy, but at least it exists and works!
